DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , single-center , randomize , control , open-label , pilot study evaluate effectiveness high dose statin load acute heart failure patient .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Effectiveness High Dose Statin Loading Acute Heart Failure Patients
DOC.criteria: Dyspnea rest minimal activity Tachypnea ( respiratory rate > 20/min ) rale pulmonary edema chest Xray Acute coronary Syndrome Hospitalization plan PTCA CABG Cardiogenic shock ( Systolic Blood Pressure < 80mmHg ) Uncontrolled hypertension ( Systolic Blood Pressure > 180mmHg ) Allergy , adverse drug reaction , hypersensitivity statin Troponin > 5 time upper limit normal ( ULN ) Creatinine kinaseMB level > 3 time ULN AST , ALT > 3 time ULN acute hepatitis Current past history muscle disease , rhabdomyolysis Life expectancy < 6 month ( e.g . metastatic malignancy , liver cirrhosis ) Pregnancy woman age childbearing potential
